title: Profana's Faceless
description: There are secrets we must learn to exist. After the devastation at The Kolosaio, a wounded Ecclesia and the fledgling community of Profana must discover unique means of staying alive in their shared desert wasteland. Can they heal the scars of past faults and reconstruct? Meanwhile, inexplicable new threats attempt to shatter their paradigms and transform reality altogether. The question both Amaru and Saios must face is what do you find when you look into mystery?
author: Mason S. Haynie
